pages.text: I just wanted to note that this quest book is far from complete and probably won't be for a while. Right now, the quests are not mandatory and are only there to provide you with a few extra tasks if you're interested in such a thing!$(br2)Side quests have a spindly pearl beside them and the main quests (none implemented yet) have a diamond next to
them.$(br2)Don't worry- quests will eventually not have to be completed manually, or at least many of them along with rewards of some sort. So, there will be reason to do them in the future.
